website_summaries.verdict: Stylish hair ties that double as bracelets.
pros: Comes with 3 ties in each pack
Can be used in hair or worn as a bracelet
cons: Black and gold color scheme is the only option available

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but yes, pricey. The ONE splurge I went with.
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality! They stretch well and the packaging is perfect for giveaways. I cut off about a 1/2 inch of the bottom so they would fit nicely in the 4x6 canvas tecovery kit bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a beautiful product! Just as shown- "Bride Tribe" black and gold selection. These will be great at the bachelorette party as bracelets or hair ties. I came back to order more after my initial purchase to make sure I have enough for everyone as they RSVP. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC6827

customer_reviews.title: love these hair ties
customer_reviews.text: Elastic hair ties like these are easily becoming my favorite. I ordered them in black and they matched everything.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Perfect bridal gift for the bridal party. Arrived quickly, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best goodie for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hair ties, the gold does not flake off or anything and after the big day, you still have two extras to wear for everyday use! An actual goodie the girls will love! Huge hit for my friends wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design peels
customer_reviews.text: The letters peel off after a few wears but these were a hit at the bachelorette party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bachelorette party, couldn't test out sturdiness yet since we haven't used it but very cute packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sona A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute bachelorette party gift
customer_reviews.text: I made graft bags for all of the ladies attending a bachelorette weekend for a friend. I loved this addition to the bags and I think everyone else did too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as shirt ties!
customer_reviews.text: The girls ended up using these as ties for our shirts during the bachelorette party. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter to give to her bridesmaids! They are absolutely perfect and my daughter couldn’t be happier! Every little detail is spot on. Even the cards they come on is absolutely perfect!! We are VERY happy customers!!
customer_reviews.author: Alishia Wondra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bachelorette hair ties!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bachelorette hair ties are really cute and a great addition to a fun weekend I’m planning for the bride to be! I showed another one of the bridesmaids and she LOVED them. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Party
customer_reviews.text: No assembly needed. Held up in every hair type to just throw hair back and was a great added piece for bachelorette party
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Pataky

customer_reviews.title: They were exactly what they were described !!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly! They looked great. They were exactly what I expected. I’m using them as part of bridesmaids gifts!! The packaging looks cute !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great bridesmaid gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bridesmaid when I asked them. They are the perfect little gift and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The packs were just as advertised. Good quality and cute packaging. Can't wait to give it to my bridesmaids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They were a perfect bachelorette weekend party favor! They kept up well and the knot doesn't fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Malone

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, everyone loved getting these as party favors at my friend's bachelorette party
customer_reviews.author: April Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bachelorette Party Favors
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one more item for my bridesmaid for my bachelorette weekend and I’m glad I went with these ones. They were perfect for the boat weekend and were super cute. The girls loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The ladies will love them.
customer_reviews.text: These were great super cute! I got these for the girls instead of sashes because these are cute, subtle, reusable. Great little momento of the night.
customer_reviews.author: salvador

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: All of the girls at my sister bachelorette LOVED these! Perfect gift for them
customer_reviews.author: Christina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and looks exactly like picture. Great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and just as described! Perfect for a bridal shower or bachelorette weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as pictured, can't wait to use these for my sisters Bach party as favors.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: I love them and can't wait to give them to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them and can't wait to give them to my girls at the bach bash! A great little gift to stick in thank you bags! They got to me so quick too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect gifts for our bridesmaids! They are still sturdy after being worn and getting wet. Great idea for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for shower!
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments at the bridal shower for having these! We used them as party favors on the table by the flowers. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but I was a little disappointed when it was one short. I only received 10 hair ties instead of 11 like the product promised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and. Any wait to give out at my bachelorette party!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect favor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift bag item! Loved how it comes on card stock with cute quote .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but they don't last long
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long for the patterns to come off of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenise Moser

customer_reviews.title: Cute, arrived very quickly, exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love everything! They showed up within 2 days looking exactly how I expected them to. Perfect for bachelorette parties.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stajduhar

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Product came very quickly. Very cute as pictured. Using for bachelorette favors. Pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Party Favor! The girls wore it on their wrist to show it off! We received a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Jingwen45

customer_reviews.title: Cute but dont work
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but when you need them to "hold your hair back" they most definitely do not!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little gift for my sisters bridal party at the bachelorette weekend! Everyone loved them
customer_reviews.author: Molly Coltogirone

customer_reviews.title: Party favor gift!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute party favor gift, all of the girls loved them! & great quality (:
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly how they appear and are perfect for my bridesmaids!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the bachelorette party I’m planning. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Heppeler

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute! Can’t wait to have the girls see them in their hangover helper bags!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hannah

customer_reviews.title: super fun surprise gift for all the bachelorette girls
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved them. They were super cute and put to use asap :)
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Raeburn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair ties
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hair ties! They are so cute and the perfect gift to include in a goodie bag for a bachelorette party.
customer_reviews.author: jenna kulikoff

product_meta.title: 6 Pack of Bachelorette Party Favors | 5 Bride Tribe Hair Ties and 1 Bride to Be Hair Tie | Bachelorette Hair Ties | Bride Tribe Favors | Bachelorette Party Hair Ties | Pop Fizz Designs
feature_bullets: BACHELORETTE PARTY HAIR TIES- A perfect gift for your "I do" crew- add to any hangover kit or bridesmaid box
BACHELORETTE PARTY SUPPLIES- No Bachelorette Bride Tribe party is complete without these Bride Tribe Hair Ties. These Bridal party favors complete any bachelorette party kit.
BACHELORETTE FAVORS- Each card reads "To have and to hold…your hair back" which makes it perfect for bachelorette party bags.
BRIDE TRIBE DECORATIONS- Help get Team Bride in the party mode with these black and gold hair ties- the perfect gold bachelorette party decorations!
BRIDESMAID HAIR TIE- These Bride Tribe hair ties make the perfect addition to your bridesmaid gifts.
